2.speaker: Karen
2.text: They say there's a disaster coming

3.speaker: Karen
3.text: Guess we'll have to leave town for a while.

1.speaker: Karen
1.text: It is all over the news. The world is coming to an end!

2.speaker: Karen
2.text: You should Pess Z at the television to find out more!

0.speaker: Karen
0.text: Are you just gonna leave us here?

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: You travelled through all through the night and consequently lost some health. You feel tired and already start missing home.

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: You travelled all through the night and consequently lost some health. You feel tired and already start missing home.

1.speaker: NightTime
1.text: Your companion was hungry and went on a midnight eating binge. As a result your food supply was decreased.

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: Your car suddenly exploded. You were able to get away, but not without injuring yourself. You lost some health and you long to go home.

0.speaker: NightTime
0.text: While you were sleeping Hank stole an item and fled the scene!

0.speaker: Hank
0.text: Your weird neighbor Hank wants to join you on your journey? Do you want to take him with you?

0.speaker: Newsarticle
0.text: Missing person report! Police are searching for a missing woman. She left her house and did not come back. Concerns are held as this behaviour is out of character.

0.speaker: Newsarticle
0.text: Missing person report! Frantic search for a missing teenager! Family asks for anyone with information about the whereabouts of a young girl  to contact authorities.

0.speaker: Basement
0.text: You went downstairs to the basement, when suddenly Hank attacks you! Luckily you have brought a weapon and are able to counter attack. Hank got scared and runs away!

0.speaker: Basement
0.text: You went to look for items in the basement, but everything went black before your eyes. Hank attacked you and you lose half your health.

0.speaker: Broadcaster
0.text: ...And that why the world is ending. Prepare to leave your home in these dark days.

1.speaker: Broadcaster
1.text: Survey's show, most people can only hold items.

2.speaker: Broadcaster
2.text: So be sure to pickup what's important or usefull you with the Z key!

3.speaker: Broadcaster
3.text: Even if it weights much and slows you down, it may hold important memories to you.

4.speaker: Broadcaster
4.text: Even if it weights much and slows you down, it may hold important memories to you.

5.speaker: Broadcaster
5.text: Umm, I guess this is the last broadcast. Sorry, just wanted to say what I could
